author: Chris Tierney
message:
feat: add visual test app for renderer verification

- Add @medli/test-app package with Vite dev server
- 2x2 matrix testing all generator/renderer combinations
- Interactive color picker for live verification
- Configured for Playwright MCP visual testing workflow

author: Chris Tierney
message:
feat: simplify spec to Frame type with background color

Replace the generic Shape-based spec with a simpler Frame-based approach:
- Frame type contains only backgroundColor
- Generator.frame(time) returns a Frame
- Renderer has render(time), loop(), and stop() methods
- Renderers accept HTML elements and render 100x100 squares
- Added DOM lib support for renderer packages
- Added jest-environment-jsdom for renderer tests

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Chris Tierney
message:
feat: bootstrap TypeScript monorepo with npm workspaces

Set up a monorepo structure with five packages:
- @medli/spec: Core types and interfaces
- @medli/generator-procedural: Procedural shape generation
- @medli/generator-object: Object-based shape generation
- @medli/renderer-svg: SVG rendering
- @medli/renderer-canvas: Canvas rendering

Configured tooling:
- TypeScript with project references
- Jest with ts-jest for testing
- ESLint with flat config
- Prettier for formatting

Updated CLAUDE.md with success criteria for edits and
acceptance criteria before committing.
